name: NSDistributedLock
desc: A lock that multiple applications on multiple hosts can use to restrict access to some shared resource, such as a file.

items.name: init?(path: String)
items.desc: Initializes an NSDistributedLock object to use as the lock the file-system entry specified by a given path.

items.name: func `try`() -> Bool
items.desc: Attempts to acquire the receiver and immediately returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the attempt was successful.

items.name: func `break`()
items.desc: Forces the lock to be relinquished.

items.name: var lockDate: Date
items.desc: Returns the time the receiver was acquired by any of the NSDistributedLock objects using the same path.
